overview.en: BitRewards (BIT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. BitRewards has a current supply of 544,070,955.5837462 with 342,725,113.8483099 in circulation. The last known price of BitRewards is 0.00017811 USD and is down -6.18 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $35.59 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://bitrewards.network/.
